question: The entire government of which country resigned recently after the constitutional amendments announced by its President?
explanation:
After the President of Russia, Vladimir Putin announced certain constitutional amendments that would extend his powers beyond Presidency, the entire government of Russia resigned. This also includes the Prime Minister of Russia, Dmitry Medvedev.
Putin made this announcement during his annual state of the nation address. He also proposed Mikhail Mishustin, the head of Russiaâ€™s tax service as the next Prime Minister. The leaving Prime Minister Medvedev may take on the position of deputy head of Russia\'s Security Council.
